name: Faculty
description:
Nowadays. Small European city.

Your friends are in danger.



This is a story about students of the Faculty of Mystic Studies who are faced with a series of mysterious circumstances.

Rumors about the Brotherhood of the Enlightened are increasingly heard in the city.

Find out what this organization does: helps those in need or conducts forbidden rituals.



There are 3 endings waiting for you in the game. Only by opening them all can you find out all the features of the story.

Who can you trust? Who is behind all this? What secrets does the cult really hide?

Find answers to all these questions
